translation.en: Hi. I'm Jon.
I'm a musical-theater writer.
One of the last of my species.
translation.zh: 也是我这类物种仅剩的其中一个

translation.en: Sorry. So… so, you know, lately, I've been hearing this sound.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我最近一直听到这声音

translation.en: Everywhere I go, like a tick, tick, tick…
translation.zh: 无论我去到哪儿都听到滴答声

translation.en: Like a time bomb in some cheesy B-movie or Saturday morning cartoon.
translation.zh: 像出现在劣质低成本商业电影 或周六早晨动画片里的定时炸弹

translation.en: The fuse has been lit. The clock counts down the seconds
translation.zh: 引线已经点着 倒计时开始

translation.en: as the flame gets closer, and closer, and closer,
until… all at once…
[woman] This is Jonathan Larson's story.
translation.zh: 这是乔纳森拉森的故事

translation.en: Happy anniversary, I love you so much.
translation.zh: 周年快乐 亲爱的 我好爱你

translation.en: [woman] Before the Tony Awards.
Before the Pulitzer Prize.
translation.zh: （《吉屋出租》已售罄！） 在荣获普利策奖之前

translation.en: Before…
We dedicate this opening night and every performance
translation.zh: 我们将开幕之夜及每一场演出献给

translation.en: to our friend, Jonathan Larson.
translation.zh: 我们的朋友 乔纳森拉森

translation.en: -[cheers] -[woman] …we lost him.
[woman] Everything you're about to see is true.
translation.zh: 你即将看到的一切都是真实的

translation.en: Except for the parts Jonathan made up.
translation.zh: 除了那些乔纳森编造出的部分

translation.en: The date is January 26th, 1990.
The setting, the barren, unfashionable no-man's-land
translation.zh: （《傲慢》围读会） 背景是贫瘠过时的无人区

translation.en: between SoHo and Greenwich Village.
translation.zh: 位于苏活区与格林威治村之间 （月舞餐厅）

translation.en: I have two keyboards, a Macintosh computer. -A cat. -[meows]
translation.zh: 我有两个键盘 一台麦金塔电脑和一只猫

translation.en: An impressive collection of compact discs,
translation.zh: 惊人的光盘及磁带收藏

translation.en: cassettes, and records of other people's music.
translation.zh: 其中包括别人的音乐录制带

translation.en: Bookshelves sagging under the weight of plays and novels I didn't write.
translation.zh: 在重压下已下垂的书架 放着不是我写的剧本和小说

translation.en: I have an original, dystopian rock musical…
translation.zh: 我有一部原创 反乌托邦式的摇滚音乐剧… （《傲慢》）

translation.en: …that I have spent the last eight years of my life writing…
-…and rewriting, and rewriting. -[laughter]
translation.zh: 写了又写 改了又改

translation.en: I have rejection letters from every major and minor producer,
translation.zh: 我收过的拒绝信多不胜数 来自业内的每一位制作人

translation.en: theater company, record label, and film studio in existence.
translation.zh: 剧院公司、唱片公司及电影制片厂

translation.en: And in just over a week…
I will be 30 years old.
Older than Stephen Sondheim when he had his first Broadway show.
translation.zh: 比斯蒂芬桑德海姆 第一次演出百老汇时还要老… (《西区故事》)

translation.en: Older than Paul McCartney when he wrote his last song with John Lennon.
translation.zh: …比保罗麦卡特尼在跟 约翰列侬写最后一首歌时还要老 （披头士《随它去吧》）

translation.en: By the time my parents were 30, they already had two kids,
translation.zh: 我父母在三十岁时已经有两个孩子

translation.en: they had careers with steady paychecks, a mortgage.
translation.zh: 稳定收入的工作 还得支付房贷

translation.en: And in eight days, my youth will be over forever.
translation.zh: 再过八天 我的青春将一去不复返

translation.en: And what exactly do I have to show for myself?
translation.zh: 而我能拿什么来展示自己的成就呢？

translation.en: Happy birthday!

I made ten copies.
You are an angel on earth.
-This is the last time. Seriously. -I know. Thank you.

translation.en: -No, no, no, I got you. -I'm gonna pay.
-[Jon] I don't want you to pay. -Somebody needs to take out this trash.
translation.zh: -我不要你付 -谁能把这袋垃圾拿去扔掉

translation.en: So I hear you're moving out of Jon's place.
translation.zh: 听说你要从乔恩家里搬出去

translation.en: That's the end of an era.
translation.zh: 那代表着一个时代的结束

translation.en: We hear him sobbing in the fridge most mornings. It's very sad.
translation.zh: 我们在多个清晨都听到 他偷偷哭泣 这很令人悲伤

translation.en: [Jon] No, no, no. We are not talking about that.
translation.zh: 不 我们别谈论这个

translation.en: Wait, Carolyn, you're coming next Friday, right? What's happening Friday?
translation.zh: -卡罗琳 你下周五会来吗？ -下周五有什么事？

translation.en: -[both] The Superbia workshop. -Surprised he hasn't mentioned it.
translation.zh: -《傲慢》工作坊 -我很惊讶他还没说

translation.en: That sounds vaguely familiar.
Guys, this is the biggest break I've ever had. This is that moment.
translation.zh: 这是我事业上最大的突破 关键性的一刻终于到来了

translation.en: It's the first time people are gonna see the show that aren't just us.
translation.zh: 这是第一次公演 观众不再只是我们

translation.en: It's good you're not putting too much pressure on it.
translation.zh: 你没施加压力 这一点真棒

translation.en: -[all chuckling] -[Jon] But it's true, though.
translation.zh: 你没施加压力 这一点真棒 这是真的 到了一定年龄

translation.en: It's like, you get to a certain age and you stop being a writer who waits tables
translation.zh: 这是真的 到了一定年龄 你就不再是端着餐盘的作家

translation.en: and you become a waiter with a hobby.
translation.zh: 你变成了一个有爱好的服务员

translation.en: Boo-Boo, you need to ask yourself, in this moment,
are you letting yourself be led by fear or by love?
translation.zh: 你是被恐惧牵着走 还是被爱引导着？

♪ Make another pass ♪
♪ Try one more approach ♪
♪ Before you're out of gas ♪
♪ Friends are getting fatter ♪
♪ Hairs on your head are getting thinner ♪

You just quit?
Well, no, I didn't just "quit" quit. I gave… I gave my notice.
translation.zh: 不 我不是直接辞职 我交了辞职通知

translation.en: -That's exactly the same thing. -No, I have two weeks left.
translation.zh: -完全是一回事 -不 我还有两周时间

translation.en: I'm allowing myself to be led by love.
What?
You know, Rosa's got another client. Craig Carnelia.
translation.zh: 罗莎的另一个客户 克雷格卡内利亚

translation.en: This is Rosa your agent, who hasn't returned your calls in a year?
translation.zh: 你那个没回电话的经纪人罗莎？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. That's the one.
So she invited the entire theater industry to Craig's musical workshop last year.
translation.zh: 她邀来所有业内人士 参加克雷格去年的音乐工作坊

translation.en: And by intermission, some producer
translation.zh: 在中场休息时 已有某位制作人

translation.en: had already written him a check for ten thousand dollars.
translation.zh: 给他写了张一万美元的支票

translation.en: I just wish that you didn't have to think like that.
translation.zh: 我真希望你不必有这样的想法

translation.en: Well, it's expensive to make art.
No, baby, it's expensive to make art here. -Yeah, but worth every penny. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -在这地方制作艺术才昂贵 -但每一分钱都值

translation.en: -That's beautiful. -I know, right?
How are you gonna pay for this, Jonathan?
♪ Peter Pan and Tinkerbell ♪
♪ Which way to Never Never Land? ♪
♪ Emerald City's gone to hell ♪
-♪ Since the wizard blew off his command ♪ -♪ Blew off his command ♪

♪ Lost children, crocodiles ♪

Ladies and gentlemen, please give it up for our band,
translation.zh: 女士先生们 请给乐队热烈的掌声

translation.en: and also for my very, very, very dear friends,
Roger and Karessa on vocals.
translation.zh: 担任主唱的罗杰和卡瑞莎

translation.en: Friday night.
-[machine beeps] -Hi, Jonathan, it's Deborah.
translation.zh: 嗨 乔纳森 我是黛博拉

translation.en: Susan dropped off your music for tonight's dance--
translation.zh: 苏珊送来了你为今晚舞会准备的音乐

translation.en: -[tape rewinds] -…but I can't get the speakers to work.
translation.zh: 苏珊送来了你为今晚舞会准备的音乐 但我无法操作扬声器

translation.en: -Hey, Pookie. -Hi.
How was Philly?
I went from the airport to a conference room and then back to the airport three hours later.
translation.zh: 我从机场直奔会议室 三小时后又回来了

translation.en: -Sounds amazing. -Mm.
[Jon] Michael was an amazing actor.
Yeah, he was the lead of every play in high school, college.
translation.zh: 他在高中和大学时 每场话剧都担任主角人物

translation.en: And then we moved to New York.
I am sick of waking up at 5:00
translation.zh: 我已厌倦在凌晨5点起床

translation.en: to get in line outside the Equity Building and wait all day,
translation.zh: 在股权大厦外排队等上一整天

translation.en: praying that the director actually even agrees to see anyone that's non-union, and then,
translation.zh: 祈祷着导演 愿意会见我们这些非工会的试镜者

translation.en: when I finally do get in the room, I sing…
translation.zh: 当我终于能走进那房间开唱

translation.en: I don't know, six measures, if I'm lucky, before they cut me off
translation.zh: 幸运的话还能唱到 六小节音乐才被他们打断

translation.en: and call me the wrong name-- Juan, Pedro, Carlos… lo que sea.
translation.zh: 把我的名字叫错成 胡安、佩德罗、卡洛斯、洛奎海

translation.en: And then a week later, he got a job at a fancy advertising company,
translation.zh: 一周后 他在大牌广告公司找到工作

translation.en: making high five figures. [exhales]
Healthcare, dental…
translation.zh: 附加医疗保健和牙科福利

translation.en: He never looked back.
You know, for someone who's broke,
you could probably spend a little bit less on party planning.
translation.zh: 你应该少在派对策划上花钱

translation.en: [Jon] Well, what is the point of money, if you're not gonna spend it on the people you love?
translation.zh: 钱不能用在心爱的人身上 赚来又有什么意义？

translation.en: -Yeah, except you don't have any money. -Oh, right.
translation.zh: 关键是你没有钱 -哦 说得对 -这封信被搁置在这里一周了

translation.en: This has been sitting here for a week.
translation.zh: -哦 说得对 -这封信被搁置在这里一周了 （最后停电通知）

translation.en: -I'm on it. -Mm-hm. Yeah. You seem very on it.
translation.zh: -我已经在处理了 -是的 你看上去十分积极

translation.en: Pretty soon you won't have me around to remind you to pay your bills on time.
translation.zh: 我不久后就搬走 到时就没人提醒你缴电费了

translation.en: How will I ever survive?
That's a very real question. Have you found a new roommate yet?
translation.zh: 这是个很现实的问题 你找到新室友了吗？

translation.en: I've been a little busy. You know. My workshop is next week.
translation.zh: 我最近有点忙 下周就要举办工作坊了

translation.en: Wait, what workshop?
That was funny.
[Michael] What time's the show tonight?
Uh…
-Curtain's at 8:00. -[Michael] Mm…
I've heard the dancing's amazing, but the music sucks.
translation.zh: 听说舞蹈表演很棒 但音乐糟透了

translation.en: [Jon] Susan grew up in a small town in the Midwest.
translation.zh: 苏珊在中西部的一个小镇长大

translation.en: She went to college to study biology, she thought she'd become a doctor, maybe teach.
translation.zh: 她上大学修读生物系 以为自己会成为一名医生或教师

translation.en: -But then she fell in love… -[all gasping] -…with modern dance instead. -[all exhale]
translation.zh: 但她后来却爱上了现代舞

translation.en: -Every parent's dream, right? -[faint laughter]
translation.zh: 这是每个父母的梦想 对吧？

translation.en: She moved to New York without knowing a soul.
translation.zh: 她搬去纽约时 一个人也不认识

translation.en: Four years later, she's already danced with every major choreographer in the city.
translation.zh: 四年后 她跟每一位 知名编舞者都有过合作

translation.en: Paul, Trisha, Merce.
1990. This was the year she was finally gonna join a company.
translation.zh: 1990年 她终于要加入一家公司

translation.en: Not just go from job to job. Actually have a home, an artistic family.
translation.zh: 有稳定的工作和自己的家 也能组织自己的艺术家庭

translation.en: And she was ready. This was her year. She knew it.
translation.zh: 她准备好迎接属于她的一年

translation.en: And then she fractured her ankle during a dress rehearsal.
translation.zh: 但她在一次彩排中扭伤脚踝

translation.en: [Jon] Six months of rehab later, she's dancing again, it's just…
translation.zh: 经过半年的康复治疗 她又开始跳舞

translation.en: whatever that moment was, when she knew…
translation.zh: 但她渐渐失去了之前的热忱

translation.en: all of a sudden, she doesn't know anymore.
translation.zh: 刹那间 她变得不知所措

translation.en: But Susan is a real artist.
translation.zh: 但苏珊是一位真正的艺术家

translation.en: She doesn't care about seeing her name in the New York Times.
translation.zh: 她不在乎自己的名字 是否被刊登在《纽约时报》

translation.en: It doesn't matter to her if she's dancing in front of five people
translation.zh: 观众人数是五人或五千人

translation.en: or in front of five thousand.
And then there's the matter of us.
translation.zh: 再来还有我们之间的事

translation.en: You know he can't afford all of this, right?
translation.zh: 你知道他负担不起这些 对吧？

translation.en: Well, he loves making a fuss, especially about you.
translation.zh: 他很喜欢大费周章 尤其对你

translation.en: After everything we've done for him…
translation.zh: 我们为他做了这么多事…

translation.en: -[Jon] Stop! -…he walks away.
Freddy, look, I'm leaving you my mixtapes. -Oh! -You can play them in remembrance of me.
translation.zh: 弗雷迪 混音带留给你 播放它以纪念我

translation.en: Jonathan Larson's famous Moondance Diner mixtape.
translation.zh: 乔纳森拉森著名的月舞餐厅混音带

translation.en: Who doesn't love showtunes with their French toast?
translation.zh: 秀场音乐搭配法式吐司真是恰当

translation.en: Actually, it's not just showtunes. It's a very eclectic mix.
translation.zh: 不仅仅是秀场音乐 这卷混音带的曲风不拘一格

translation.en: -Someone's very touchy about mixtapes. -Apparently.
translation.zh: -看来有人很在意混音带 -显然是的

translation.en: Okay, listen. I'm happy for you. -I really am. -Oh, yeah?
I'm also extremely bitter and jealous and envious,
translation.zh: 我也感到十分苦涩 对你又妒忌又羡慕

translation.en: and sort of hateful towards you right now.
I mean… he's getting out.
And you're gonna be next.
-Well, I got a callback last week. -Great!

translation.zh: -是一家游轮公司 -游轮有什么不好？

I hated singing. I just did it for the pussy. [laughs]

translation.en: -Scott's in finance. -Shocking.

translation.en: Welcome. I'm gonna get another drink.

Jon?

♪ Floating on a sea of gray ♪
[Jon] Once a week, we would gather the few surviving members of our dwindling tribe.

translation.en: real writers.
The theater legends, who created the Broadway shows

translation.en: as soon as we walked through the door.
Is it really him?
It was.
Stephen Sondheim.
-[laughter] -[man] All right, I'll start.
I'm lost.
I… I don't know what the show is.
Is it social commentary? Is it science fiction?
translation.zh: 是在评论社会还是在讲述科幻小说？

translation.en: I think this is a musical that knows exactly what it is.

translation.en: Yes. Yes. Of course, yes. Abso--
The world that you've created is really original.

translation.en: It's fascinating.
The problem is, it's not particularly easy to follow the emotional thread.

translation.en: -Does that make sense? -Okay. Okay.
Yes, yes. We're on the same page. That's exactly how I felt.

translation.en: We're saying the same thing, just differently.

Yeah, okay… Yes. Yes. The individual songs.

translation.en: First rate lyric and tune. Well done.

Thank you.
Those five words were enough to keep me going for the next two years.

-Jon, this is a reading. -Mm. You'll have a piano.

So, at the very least I'll need a synth and drums and a guitar and--

and then we can get the audience in and out in half an hour.

And piano is the absolute bare minimum for this.

Hey, Rosa, this is Jonathan Larson, your client.

-It's fine. -Mm.
Nobody has more contacts in the industry than Rosa.

First day of rehearsal.

Thank you for all this. Thank you.

I know that his time is limited. Oh! It would be such a treat!

translation.zh: -我手上拿着信用卡… -计费办公室关门了

translation.en: I would love to figure it out right now.
The billing office is closed for the night.
translation.zh: 计费办公室今晚已关门了

translation.en: -What am I gonna do? -Sir, like I've said, call--
translation.zh: -那我该怎么办？ -先生 我已经说了 请致电…

translation.en: -[woman] Hello? -Hey, Beth. Hey.
How are you? It's Jon.
Hi, Jon.
Hi, um… is Susan there?
She doesn't wanna talk to you, Jon.
Yeah.
Sure, sure. Uh…
Well, can you… um… can you give her a message for me?
-What is it? -Well, it's just, you know…
I wanted to remind her that tomorrow is my workshop and you know, I…
translation.zh: 我想提醒她 我的工作坊明天开始

translation.en: I know I don't have any right to ask this. It's just that…
translation.zh: 我知道我无权提出要求

translation.en: I would just really love her to be there.
I'll tell her you called.
[Jon] Here I am.
The musical to which I have devoted my youth
translation.zh: 我奉献了青春创作的音乐剧

translation.en: is about to be put on public display for every producer in New York.
translation.zh: 即将公开展示给纽约每一位制作人

translation.en: I haven't written a single note or a single lyric
translation.zh: 但我还没替剧中最重要的歌

translation.en: of the most important song in the show.
translation.zh: 写出一个音符或一首歌词

translation.en: I have no electricity.
My best friend is furious with me. My girlfriend isn't speaking to me.
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友在生我的气 我的女友不愿跟我说话

translation.en: And there is only one thing I can think of to do:
Swim.
♪ I hate this locker room Why won't Susan answer my calls? ♪
translation.zh: 我讨厌这个更衣室 苏珊为什么不接我电话？

translation.en: ♪ Sweat, wet, echo Smell, hell, rap ♪
translation.zh: 汗、湿、回声、气味、地狱、说唱

translation.en: ♪ Pump up the volume Hot, wet, hot sweat ♪
translation.zh: 提高音量吧 热、湿、热、汗

translation.en: ♪ How's the water? ♪
♪ Stretch, stretch Spit in the mask ♪
translation.zh: 拉伸再拉伸 在泳镜上吐口水

translation.en: ♪ Cloudy vision Test the water ♪
translation.zh: 模糊的视线 测试一下水温

translation.en: ♪ Contemplate the dive The shock to the skin ♪
translation.zh: 考虑潜入水中对肌肤的冲击

translation.en: ♪ Anticipate the pain, the pain, the pain The pain, the pain now ♪
translation.zh: 准备好承受那种痛、痛、痛

translation.en: ♪ One, two, three, Oh, bite the air, seven ♪
♪ There's that girl One, two, three ♪
translation.zh: 是那个女孩 一、二、三

translation.en: ♪ Oh, bite the air Smooth, soft skin ♪
translation.zh: 哦 再换口气 那光滑柔软的皮肤

translation.en: ♪ Two, three Oh, bite the-- Thirteen ♪
♪ Long legs, brown skin and wet hair ♪
translation.zh: 长腿 棕色皮肤和湿头发

translation.en: ♪ Whoa, and wet hair ♪
♪ Has Rosa even listened to my tape? ♪
translation.zh: 罗莎有没有听过我的录音带？

translation.en: ♪ Kick, stretch, windmill arms See the hand, point the feet ♪
translation.zh: 踢腿、伸展、风车手臂 眼睛往前看 脚伸直

translation.en: ♪ Wet hair Relax, this guy's too slow ♪
translation.zh: 湿头发 放轻松 这家伙太慢了

translation.en: ♪ Fifteen Can I make it to 40? ♪
translation.zh: 十五 我能撑到四十吗？

translation.en: ♪ Too slow Touch his heel, move! ♪
translation.zh: 太慢了 触碰他的脚后跟 快让开！

translation.en: ♪ Answer my calls! Red thin stripe ♪
translation.zh: 接听我的电话！红色细条纹

translation.en: ♪ Fifty feet, sixty feet She looks like Susan ♪
translation.zh: 五十尺、六十尺 她长得真像苏珊

translation.en: ♪ Susan's beautiful ♪
♪ Out, don't think, out, out Let it out ♪
translation.zh: 宣泄 别想 发泄出来吧

translation.en: ♪ Keep the shoulder down, down ♪
♪ Easy, not too hard ♪
♪ Find the movement's origin ♪
♪ Hands, no Shoulder, no ♪
translation.zh: 手臂不对 肩膀不对

translation.en: ♪ Elbows, no ♪
♪ Lower, from the back Yes, lower ♪
translation.zh: 背部再低点 是的 再低点

translation.en: ♪ Thirty-nine, 40 ♪
♪ Center, center ♪
♪ Forward motion ♪
♪ Through the water ♪
♪ Come to your senses ♪
-♪ Escape ♪ -♪ Come to your senses ♪
♪ Come to your senses ♪
♪ I am soaring ♪
-♪ I'm the water ♪ -♪ You're on the air ♪
-♪ You as the knight ♪ -♪ I'm underground ♪
♪ Me as the queen ♪
[Jon] The show is about to begin.
The room is completely empty.
The show is about to begin, and I am looking
translation.zh: 演出即将开始而我正在望着

translation.en: at 60 empty folding chairs.
translation.zh: 六十张空荡荡的折叠椅

translation.en: [whispers] Hi.
Hey, boy genius.
I'm turning 30 on Sunday, you know.
translation.zh: 我这周日就年满三十岁了

translation.en: Oh, well, happy birthday.
Thank you.
-Thirty's still young, you know. -No one's here.
translation.zh: -三十还年轻 知道吧 -没人来

translation.en: Oh. It's not even 9:00.
The presentation doesn't start till 10:00.
That's good.
-Cool. [laughs] -[laughing]
Okay. [panting]
-Can you sight read? -Yeah.
[Jon] Slowly, miraculously, people start to show up.
translation.zh: 慢慢地 奇迹般似的 人们开始出现

translation.en: -Johnny. -[Jon] Be right back.
This is phenomenal. Look at the space, it's just phenomenal.
translation.zh: 这真是不同凡响 看看这地方

translation.en: -It's a rehearsal studio, Dad. -It's a Broadway rehearsal studio.
translation.zh: -这里是排练室 爸爸 -是百老汇的排练室

translation.en: -This is the real thing. -We're so excited for you, dear.
translation.zh: -很厉害的 -我们为你感到兴奋

translation.en: -Thank you. -Are they paying you?
-No. -[sighs]
-Next time. -Sure.
-[father] Oh, look, for us. -No, that's not…
translation.zh: -是为我们预留的位子 -不 那不是…

translation.en: -That's for someone else, actually. -Mm. Do you like that?
translation.zh: -这是预留给其他人的 -你喜欢吗？

translation.en: You can literally sit in any other seat.
translation.zh: 你们可以坐在其他任何座位上

translation.en: -Okay. Break a leg. -Shall we sit there?
translation.zh: -好的 祝你演出成功 -我们坐这里吧？

translation.en: -I love you. Thank you. -I love you.
His hair is ridiculous.
Good turnout.
Yeah, mostly friends.
translation.zh: 是的 大多都是朋友

translation.en: Mm, what a nightmare.
Thank you… for being here.
Wild horses, Jon. You know that.
translation.zh: 什么也阻挡不了我 乔恩 你懂的

translation.en: -Oh! Okay. Break legs. -Yeah.
Oh. Thank you. Thank you.
Ira, you son of a gun.
translation.zh: 艾拉 你这个好家伙

translation.en: -Jonathan, how are you? -Rosa.
-Jon Larson. -Oh, there he is.
Just the man I'm looking for. You nervous? Don't be nervous.
translation.zh: 我最想看到的人 你感到紧张吗？不要紧张

translation.en: -Yeah. A little nervous. Sure. -Of course you're nervous.
translation.zh: -是的 有点紧张 -你当然感到紧张

translation.en: The first presentation of your musical is like having a colonoscopy in Times Square.
translation.zh: 第一次的音乐剧展示会 就像在时代广场做结肠镜检查一样

translation.en: Only with a colonoscopy, the worst thing that could happen is you find out you have cancer.
translation.zh: 而结肠镜检查最糟糕的 不过是得知自己患有癌症

translation.en: With a musical, you find out you're already dead.
translation.zh: 但以音乐剧来说 你已被判死刑了

translation.en: Have a good show. Can't wait to see what you did.
translation.zh: 演出成功 我迫不及待想看

translation.en: We can't keep waiting. It's quarter past.
translation.zh: 不能再等了 已经延迟一刻钟了

translation.en: I know. I know. I know.
-Break a leg. -Okay.
Come here. Thank you.
Hello. Hi, welcome.
I'm Jonathan Larson.
Whoa… Hey, well…
You don't have to do that. Thank you so much, that was very kind. Uh…
translation.zh: 没必要 但是谢谢好意

translation.en: Thank you for being here, um, this morning. -This is, um… -[door shuts]
translation.zh: 谢谢各位今早抽空前来

translation.en: -[whispering] That's Stephen Sondheim. -Right. Like I was saying…
translation.zh: -那是斯蒂芬桑德海姆 -好的 谢谢各位能出席 这是我创作的音乐剧《傲慢》

translation.en: Thank you all for being here. This is my musical, Superbia,
translation.zh: 谢谢各位能出席 这是我创作的音乐剧《傲慢》

translation.en: and I've been working on it for… a little while now.
translation.zh: 我写这部剧用了好一段时间

translation.en: And I just really hope you all like it.
Thank you.
And the next hour and a half are a blur.
translation.zh: 接下来的一个半小时 我的记忆是模糊的

translation.en: ♪ Everyone who ever has Or ever will be anyone will be there ♪
translation.zh: 无论是有头有脸还是 有权有势的人全都将到场

translation.en: ♪ Never in the history of entertainment Will there be an affair quite like it ♪
translation.zh: 在娱乐界的历史上 从未有过如此的盛典

translation.en: ♪ The event of the century ♪
♪ The quintessential social adventure ♪
translation.zh: 是社交冒险体验的典范

translation.en: ♪ We cannot afford to miss This night of bliss ♪
translation.zh: 我们不能错过这幸福的夜晚

translation.en: ♪ Everyone who's anyone knows Everyone who's anyone knows ♪
translation.zh: 有头有脸的人都认识有权有势的人

translation.en: ♪ Everyone who's anyone Everyone who's anyone knows ♪
translation.zh: 有头有脸的人都认识有权有势的人

translation.en: ♪ Everyone will be there ♪
And then…
Karessa steps forward to sing my new song.
translation.zh: 卡瑞莎走上前来唱我的新歌

translation.en: Not even 12 hours old.
translation.zh: 在不到十二小时前完成

translation.en: I close my eyes.
I brace myself.
I don't dare take a breath.
But when I open my eyes…
I don't see Karessa there.
translation.zh: 眼前看到的不是卡瑞莎

translation.en: ♪ You're on the air ♪
♪ I'm underground ♪
♪ Signal's fading ♪
♪ Can't be found ♪
♪ I finally open up ♪
♪ For you, I would do anything ♪
translation.zh: 为了你我愿意付出一切

translation.en: ♪ But you've turned off the volume ♪
♪ Just when I've begun to sing ♪
♪ Come to your senses ♪
♪ Defenses are not the way to go ♪
♪ And you know, or at least you knew ♪
translation.zh: 你也明白 至少曾经明白

translation.en: ♪ Can't you recall when this all began ♪
translation.zh: 还记得吗 在最开始时

translation.en: ♪ It was only you and me ♪
♪ It was only me and you ♪
♪ I have to laugh ♪
♪ We sure put on a show ♪
♪ Love is passé in this day and age ♪
translation.zh: 爱情在这个时代已经过时

translation.en: ♪ How can we expect it to grow? ♪
♪ You as the knight ♪
♪ Me as the queen ♪
♪ All I've got tonight ♪
♪ Is static on a screen ♪
translation.zh: 只是屏幕上的静止画面

translation.en: ♪ Come to your senses Suspense is fine ♪
translation.zh: 清醒过来吧 停滞也没关系

translation.en: ♪ If you're just an empty image ♪
♪ Emanating out of a screen ♪
♪ Baby, be real You can feel again ♪
translation.zh: 宝贝 真实一点 你可以再次感受

translation.en: ♪ You don't need a music box melody ♪
translation.zh: 你不需要音乐盒的旋律

translation.en: ♪ To know what I mean ♪
♪ Deep in my eyes What do you see? ♪
translation.zh: 在我的眼睛深处 你看到了什么

translation.en: ♪ Deep in my sighs Listen to me ♪
translation.zh: 在我深深的叹息中 请听我说

translation.en: ♪ Let the music commence from inside ♪
♪ Not only one sense, but use all five ♪
translation.zh: 运用五感而非只有一种

♪ Come to your senses ♪
-♪ Come to your senses, yeah ♪ -♪ Come to your senses ♪
♪ Come to your senses ♪
♪ Baby, come back ♪
♪ Alive ♪
-Hello? -Hi, honey, it's Rosa.
translation.zh: -喂？ -嗨 亲爱的 我是罗莎

translation.en: Hi, Rosa. Thank you so much for calling.
translation.zh: 嗨 罗莎 谢谢你打来

translation.en: Well, you already left six messages.
[chuckles] Yeah. Um… So have you heard anything yet?
translation.zh: 是的 有什么消息吗？

translation.en: Honey, I have heard nothing but raves all day long.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我一天下来只听到赞赏

translation.en: I'm getting call after call after call.
Okay. Yes! That's great news.
Everyone is telling me the same thing. "That Jonathan Larson!"
translation.zh: 每个人都告诉我同样的事 “好一个乔纳森拉森！

translation.en: "I can't wait to see what he does next."
translation.zh: 我迫不及待想看看 他接下来还有什么作品”

translation.en: What do you mean, what I do next? What about Superbia?
translation.zh: 接下来是什么意思？ 《傲慢》音乐剧的制作呢？

translation.en: I always told you, it was a tough sell.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过多少次了 这部剧很难销售出去

translation.en: It's too arty for Broadway.
translation.zh: 这对百老汇来说太文艺了

translation.en: Tourists aren't gonna shell out 50 dollars
translation.zh: 游客不会愿意掏出50美元

translation.en: to see a show about spaceships and robots.
translation.zh: 观看宇宙飞船和机器人的音乐剧

translation.en: Um… That's not what it's about. Um…
translation.zh: 那部剧的内容不是这样的

translation.en: Well, of course, I know that, Jonathan.
translation.zh: 我当然知道 乔纳森

translation.en: But you know these producers, they care about one thing and one thing only.
translation.zh: 但制作人只在乎能否有回报

translation.en: Okay. Uh… So what about Off-Broadway?
It's too expensive for Off.
translation.zh: 这对外百老汇来说太贵了

translation.en: You got a cast of thousands, with the special effects…
translation.zh: 你需要众多演员 还得加上特效…

translation.en: Uh… Charlie, tell him I'll be on in a sec.
translation.zh: 查理 告诉他我马上就来

translation.en: -Listen, sweetie, I gotta run. -I'm sorry, Rosa…
translation.zh: -我得走了 -我很抱歉 罗莎

translation.en: Congratulations on a terrific presentation.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 演示会很精彩

translation.en: Rosa, Rosa, hold on.
So, okay…
So what am I supposed to do now?
You start writing the next one.
And after you finish that one, you start on the next.
And on and on, and that's what it is to be a writer, honey.
translation.zh: 剧作家的生涯就是 连续不断的写作 亲爱的

translation.en: You just keep throwing them against the wall
and hoping against hope that eventually, something sticks.
Little advice from someone who's been in this business a long, long time?
translation.zh: 作为在这行打滚多年的老鸟 让我给你一个忠告吧

translation.en: On the next one, maybe try writing about what you know.
translation.zh: 下一部剧尝试写你了解的事

translation.en: Okay, kiddo?
Yeah.
Start sharpening those pencils.
Yeah, yeah.
I think let's give it a minute and see what happens next week.
translation.zh: 我们不如缓一缓 看下周有什么进展

translation.en: Hey, I need a job.
translation.zh: 嘿 我需要一份工作

translation.en: -Can you hold on a second? -I'll apologize to the focus group lady.
translation.zh: -你能稍等一下吗？ -我愿意跟研究小组的女士道歉

translation.en: I will never say anything bad about marketing research ever again, I swear to God.
translation.zh: 我发誓不再数落营销行业

translation.en: I'm gonna call you right back.
I wanna do what you do. I wanna have what you have.
I want the BMW, I want the doorman, I want it, I want all of it. Okay?
translation.zh: 我要宝马也要有门卫 我要拥有这一切 行吗？

translation.en: -What's going on? -Oh, it's good. It's good.
I just spent the last eight years killing myself on a musical that's never gonna happen.
translation.zh: 我用尽八年时间写了 一部永远不会成功的音乐剧

translation.en: I find that very hard to believe. It was incredible this morning.
translation.zh: 那实在难以置信 今早的表演精彩极了

translation.en: Well…But not incredible enough.
I can't do it again, Mike.
translation.zh: 我没法再重来一遍 迈克

translation.en: I can't stomach five more years of waiting tables,
translation.zh: 我不能忍受再做五年的服务员

translation.en: five more years of writing things that no one will ever see
translation.zh: 再投入五年时间写没人愿意看的东西

translation.en: while Broadway just churns out mega-musicals without a hint of even the slightest thing original
translation.zh: 而百老汇却频频推出 没有一丝原创性的大型音乐剧

translation.en: or, God forbid, something to actually say about the world!
translation.zh: 对这个世界一点意义也没有！

translation.en: Are you done?
-No, actually-- -The presentation, Jon, it was amazing.
It would be a tragedy to give up what you have.
translation.zh: 你若放弃自己的天赋才可悲

translation.en: -You did it. -Please! [laughs]
I was a mediocre actor.
Do you know how many mediocre actors there are in New York City?
translation.zh: 你知道纽约有多少平庸的演员吗？

translation.en: Do you know how many Jonathan Larsons there are?
translation.zh: 但你知道有几个乔纳森拉森吗？

translation.en: One.
I can't keep wasting my time, Mike.
translation.zh: 我不能一直浪费时间 迈克

translation.en: -I turn 30 in two days. -And?
translation.zh: -我过两天就年满三十了 -那又怎么样？

translation.en: And Stephen Sondheim was 27 when he had his first show on Broadway.
translation.zh: 斯蒂芬桑德海姆二十七岁 就迎来在百老汇的第一场演出

translation.en: Well, guess what? You're not Stephen Sondheim. Wait a little longer--
translation.zh: 你不是斯蒂芬桑德海姆 再等一下

translation.en: I'm not waiting anymore. I can't keep waiting. This is my life.
translation.zh: -我的人生不能一直等待 -我明白

translation.en: -I understand. -No, you don't. I'm running out of time.
translation.zh: -我的人生不能一直等待 -我明白 不 你不明白 我没时间了

translation.en: -You are not running out of time. -You don't know anything about it.
translation.zh: -你有的是时间 -你什么都不知道

translation.en: I'm HIV-positive.
What?
-How long have you known? -A few days.
Who knows? I might get lucky. People do.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢 或许我会是幸运的那个

translation.en: Live a year, longer even.
Anyway, I think I might know a thing or two about running out of time.
translation.zh: 我对于没时间这件事很有感触

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me sooner?
You tried.
-[phone rings] -[woman] Jill Kramer returning, line two.
I have to take that.
-Mike-- -I can't talk about this now, please.
translation.zh: -迈克… -我现在不想谈论这件事

translation.en: Jill. Hey, it's Michael.
Yeah, I just want to see how the Downy account was going.
translation.zh: 我想知道当妮品牌的案子进展如何

translation.en: [Jon] I think of the day I met Michael.
translation.zh: 我想起遇见迈克的那一天

translation.en: [Jon] It was the first day at sleep-away camp, 22 years ago.
translation.zh: 那是二十二年前在露营地的第一天

translation.en: We were eight.
I think of high school, all the shows we did together.
translation.zh: 我想起在高中时一起参与的演出

translation.en: ♪ Is this real life? ♪
I think of the summer that our parents decided to stay
translation.zh: 我想起那个夏天 我们的父母决定搬来

translation.en: in the same town in Cape Cod, a mile away from each other.
translation.zh: 科德角的同一个小镇 彼此相距1.5公里

translation.en: And we'd meet on the beach every night and, um…
translation.zh: 我们每晚都相约在海滩上

translation.en: we'd just sit there talking till three in the morning about our plans.
translation.zh: 一直聊到凌晨3点 说着自己对未来的展望

translation.en: [crying] About how one day we were gonna move to the city together and…
translation.zh: 我们说要一同搬到城市

translation.en: …find a cheap apartment and be discovered,
translation.zh: 找个廉价的公寓 等着被发掘

translation.en: and change the world.
[woman on recording] Hey, you've reached Susan, Beth--
translation.zh: 嘿 你已接通苏珊、贝丝…

translation.en: [Jon] I think of the first summer back from college.
translation.zh: 我想起大学的第一个夏天

translation.en: We smoked a bowl on Kennedy breakwater and Michael told me he was gay.
translation.zh: 我们在防波堤上抽大麻 迈克告诉我他是同性恋

translation.en: [Jon] I think of our friends, so many.
translation.zh: 我想起我们众多的朋友

translation.en: -I think of their funerals. -[sobbing]
[Jon] I think of their parents not even 50, saying the Kaddish over their children.
translation.zh: 他们不到五十岁的父母 为自己的孩子念哀悼词

translation.en: [Jon] I think of them and I think of Michael.
translation.zh: 我想起他们 也想起了迈克

translation.en: And before I understand what's happening, I start running.
translation.zh: 在我还没弄明白前 我开始往前奔跑

translation.en: Past the pond, past the carousel.
translation.zh: 越过池塘 也越过旋转木马

translation.en: ♪ Is this real life? ♪
translation.zh: （关于艾滋病毒 采取行动）

translation.en: [Jon] The ticking is so loud now, I can't hear anything.
translation.zh: 滴答声太吵杂了 我什么也听不到

translation.en: My heartbeat is pounding in my throat.
translation.zh: 我心跳加速 似乎要冲出喉咙

translation.en: The wind is shrieking through the trees.
The sky is darkening.
I want it to stop. [crying] I want it all to stop!
translation.zh: 我想让它停下来 这一切都停止！

translation.en: ♪ When I was nine ♪
♪ Michael and I ♪

Hey. Whatever happens next, I'm here. I promise.
translation.zh: 不管接下来发生什么事 我答应会跟你一同面对

translation.en: There's, um… there's a support group, it's called Friends In Deed.
translation.zh: 有个称之为“真心朋友”的支援小组

translation.en: I just called them. They have a meeting tomorrow morning. -You look like shit. -[laughs]
translation.zh: -他们明早有个聚会 -你看上去糟透了

translation.en: I'm so cold.
Come on.
Oh, Mike.
-[both crying] -I'm sorry.
Sunday.
My 30th birthday.
-[Jon on machine] ♪ Speak ♪ -[beeps]
Jon? Steve Sondheim here.
translation.zh: 是乔恩吗？我是斯蒂芬桑德海姆

translation.en: Rosa gave me this number, I hope it's okay to call you.
translation.zh: 这个号码是罗莎给我的 希望你不会介意

translation.en: I didn't get a chance to speak with you after the reading, but I just wanted to say it was really good.
translation.zh: 我那天没机会跟你说话 但我想告诉你 你表现非常好

translation.en: Congratulations.
I'd love to get together and talk to you about it, if you have any interest.
-No pressure. -[chuckles]
The main thing though, is that it's first-rate work and has a future.
translation.zh: 我主要想说的是 那是一流的作品也极具潜力

translation.en: And so do you.
I'll call you later with some thoughts, if that's okay. Meanwhile, be proud.
translation.zh: 我稍后再联系你详谈 为自己感到骄傲吧

translation.en: You know, there was a small-- very, very small piece of me
that was the teensiest bit happy to hear you're not leaving.
translation.zh: 我心中感到一丝丝窃喜

translation.en: I'd have been sad not to see you every Sunday morning.
translation.zh: 每个周日见不到你 我会很难过的

translation.en: Oh. Cheers.
I told Freddy. He's pissed off at your agent.
translation.zh: 我跟弗雷迪说了 他对你的经纪人很生气

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -How is he?
-He should be going home soon. -Really?
translation.zh: -他应该很快就能回家了 -真的？

translation.en: Yes. Yes. [laughing]
-[glasses clink] -[whispers] God…
-Uh, I'll be-- Yeah. -You go handle that.
-Hi. -Hi.
I didn't know you were, um…
I wasn't sure whether you would want me here.
translation.zh: 我不确定你是否想见到我

translation.en: I'm so happy you're here.
So how was the reading? Did anybody--?
translation.zh: 演示会顺利吗？有没有人…

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No, it's okay.
-I really wanted to be there. I just-- -Susan…
I know.
What are you gonna do now?
I'm gonna start the next one.
I decided to take the job.
[softly] Okay.
I'm happy for you.
Happy birthday.
Thank you.
You really didn't have to get me anything.
It's for the next one.
Got any ideas?
Just questions.
That seems like a really good place to start.
translation.zh: 那听起来是个不错的起点

translation.en: Goodbye, Jonathan.
[Susan] The next one was tick, tick… BOOM!
translation.zh: 他的下一部音乐剧是《倒数时刻》

translation.en: After that, he went back to a project he'd started and put away, called Rent.
translation.zh: 他接着重拾早期的半成品 完成了《吉屋出租》

translation.en: It ran on Broadway for 12 years.
translation.zh: 那部音乐剧在百老汇上演了十二年

translation.en: It changed the definition of what a musical could be.
What it could sound like.
translation.zh: 也开启了不同的演唱模式

translation.en: The kinds of stories it could tell.
Jonathan never got to see it.
The night before Rent's first public performance, he died…
translation.zh: 《吉屋出租》首次公开演出的前一晚 他因突发性主动脉瘤过世

translation.en: from a sudden aortic aneurysm.
translation.zh: 他因突发性主动脉瘤过世

translation.en: He was 35 years old.
He still had so many questions.
translation.zh: 他仍有许多想问的问题
